channel.title: Reinforcement Learning on YKhorizon
channel.description: Recent content in Reinforcement Learning on YKhorizon

item.title: Introduction to reinforcement learning
item.description: Learning is driven by reward What will you get in this article Basic concept of reinforcement learning Outline Concept In many scenario, real world problems do not exist the ground true answer. The supervised learning could not handle this problem. But we can use trial and error to get the answer then calibrate our behavior. The key concept is reward from environment. That is also the way human learning new thing.
